definitions.body: :Ju Jdg 15:4 torch (NH id.);—´[[ל]] abs. Ju Jdg 15:4, Is 62:1; cstr. Ge 15:17, Zec 12:6; pl. [[לַפִּידִים]] Ju Jdg 15:5 + 2 t., [[לַפִּידִם]] Ex 20:18, [[לַפִּדִים]] Ju Jdg 7:16 + 3 t.; cstr. [[לַפִּידֵי]] Da 10:6:—torch, Ju Jdg 7:16, Ju Jdg 7:20, Jdg 15:4, Jdg 15:4, Jdg 15:5 (kindled, ´[[הִבְעִיר אֵשׁ בְּ]]); [[לַפִּיד אֵשׁ]] Ge 15:17 ( + [[עָשָׁן]], [[תַּנּוּר]]; JE), Zec 12:6 (sim. of conquering power of [chiefs of] Judah ; ‖[[כִּיּוֹר אֵשׁ]]), [[לַפִּידֵי אֵשׁ]] Da 10:6 (sim. of eyes of angel in vision; ‖[[וּפָנׇיו כְּמַרְאֵה בָרָק]]); sim. of flashes (reflected from) darting chariots Na 2:15 (‖[[בְּרָקִים]]); ´[[ל]] of lightning-flashes Ex 20:18 (E; + [[בְּוֹלֽת]] thunder-peals); of flashing water-drops expelled by snortings of crocodile Job 41:11 (‖[[כִּידוֹדֵי]] [[אֵשׁ]]); of flame between cherubim Ez Eze 1:13 (‖[[גַּחֲלֵי־]] [[אֵשׁ]], [[אֵשׁ]]); sim. of Zion's glorious deliverance Is 62:1 (‖[[נׁגַהּ]]).—[[לַפִּיד]] Job 12:5 v. sub [[פִּיד]].
